titleStmt.title: A compendious or short treatise, gathered out of the chyefe and principall authors of phisycke conteynyuge certeyne preceptes necessary to the preseruacion of healthe, and longe continuaunce of the same: verye pleasaunte and profitable to reade.
titleStmt.author: Wingfield, Henry.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Stoughten, dwellynge wythin Ludgate at the sygne of the Bishoppes Myter,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: the sygne of the Bishoppes Myter
